mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, nick_name, sex, student_number, phone_number, address, score, head_portrait, audit_picture, `password`) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, student_number = #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_picture = #{auditPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, nick_name, sex, student_number, phone_number, address, score, head_portrait, audit_picture, `password` from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, user_name, nick_name, sex, student_number, phone_number, address, score, head_portrait, audit_picture, `password` from user
